name: LIST_ITEMS
description: List data to be labeled. If there is too much data, only a part of it will be listed.

search.description: The keyword to be searched for. If None, all data will be listed.

with_category.description: Whether to list the data with category. If True, the data with category will be listed.

offset.description: The offset of the data to be listed. If None, the first data will be listed.

limit.description: Set the maximum number of data to be listed. If None, all data will be tried to be listed.

ids.description: The ids of the data point to be labeled. Separate multiple ids with comma.

category.description: The label to be assigned to the data point.

search.description: The keyword to be searched for. If None, all categories will be listed.

name.description: The name of the category to be added.
